# vImage.PixelBuffer.Histogram8888

**Type Alias**

The histogram for four channel 8-bit pixel buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Histogram8888 = ([vImagePixelCount], [vImagePixelCount], [vImagePixelCount], [vImagePixelCount])
```

## Type aliases

- **vImage.PixelBuffer.Histogram888**: The histogram for three channel 8-bit pixel buffers.
- **vImage.PixelBuffer.HistogramFFF**: The histogram for three channel 32-bit pixel buffers.
- **vImage.PixelBuffer.HistogramFFFF**: The histogram for four channel 32-bit pixel buffers.

items.description: The histogram for three channel 8-bit pixel buffers.
items.name: vImage.PixelBuffer.Histogram888

items.description: The histogram for three channel 32-bit pixel buffers.
